useCase.name: Manage Campers Schedule
useCase.description: As a CampWorker, I want to view and manage the schedule and location of assigned campers.

preconditions.precondition: The CampWorker is logged into the Camp Management System.

mainSequence.step: CampWorker logs into the Camp Management System.
Camp Management System fetches the list of assigned campers from Camper Profiles database.
Camp Management System requests the schedule and location for each camper from the Scheduling Service.
Scheduling Service provides the schedule and locations to the Camp Management System.
Camp Management System displays the campers along with their schedule and location to the CampWorker.
